The City of Merkel City Hall will be closed on Monday, February 16, 2026 in observance of Presidents’ Day and will reopen with regular business hours on Tuesday, February 17, 2026.

*The Merkel City Board of Adjustments meeting will be held on February 5, 2026 at 6:00 PM in Heritage Hall, 111 Taylor Street, Merkel.*

*The Merkel City Council meeting will be held on February 17, 2026 at 6:00 PM in Heritage Hall, 111 Taylor Street, Merkel.*

*The Merkel EDC will meet on Monday, March 2, 2025 at 6:00 PM
in Heritage Hall, 111 Taylor Street, Merkel.*

*The Planning and Zoning Committe will meet on Thursday, November 6, 2025 at 1:00 PM in Heritage Hall, 111 Taylor Street, Merkel.*

### **City of Merkel Municipal Energy Usage** 5

The City of Merkel purchases natural gas from Atmos Energy. In Calendar Year 2025, the City purchased a total of 3,699 thousand cubic feet (MCF) of natural gas.
The City purchases electricity from GEXA Energy and Taylor Electric Cooperative. In Calendar Year 2025, the City purchased a total of 481,005 kilowatt-hours.
The City purchases water from the City of Abilene. In Calendar Year 2025, the City purchased a total of 77,671,000 gallons of water.
The total cost of natural gas, electricity, and water purchased by the City in the Calendar Year 2025 is $776,431.53
